tweet.text: Current or recent grad students in the history of U.S. foreign relations: Apply to the Presidential Management Fellows Program for a chance to work with @HistoryAtState on the #FRUS series! #PMF applications accepted Sept. 28 to Oct. 12: https://t.co/9MdLicfclR https://t.co/BeXDo3QJBj
tweet.html: Current or recent grad students in the history of U.S. foreign relations: Apply to the Presidential Management Fellows Program for a chance to work with @HistoryAtState on the #FRUS series! #PMF applications accepted Sept. 28 to Oct. 12: bit.ly/OH-PMF
